title: Great 5 Bed steps to Brighton Cntr & Oak Sq. Avail 9/1
posting_body: Fantastic updated apartment just steps to Brighton Center and Oak Square.
Property features include 5 beds with 1.5 baths, hardwood floors throughout, living room, updated eat in kitchen with dishwasher, ceiling fans, common yard, onsite laundry and more.
Located just a short distance from New Balance's Boston Landing, area shops, restaurants, Starbucks, YMCA and major routes such as the Mass Turnpike and Storrow Drive.
Walk to public transportation - Express Bus 501 & 503 to Downtown Boston & Copley Square.
Contact Matt 781-316-4295 for details and to set up a showing.
Fantastic updated apartment just steps to Brighton Center and Oak Square on a highly desired street.

Property features include 6 total rooms with 3 beds, hardwood floors throughout, living room, dining room, eat in kitchen with dishwasher and disposal, front and rear porches, off street parking and more.
Pets: Pet Friendly / Subject to Landlord Approval
Call Matt Moran 781-316-4295 for details and to set up a showing.
